premise_source_doc_sentence: Philip Davis Guggenheim  (  born November 3 , 1963  )  is an American film and television director and producer .

claim: Davis Guggenheim is a television producer and show-runner.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His credits include NYPD Blue , ER , 24 , Alias , The Shield , Deadwood , and the documentaries An Inconvenient Truth , The Road We 've Traveled , Waiting for ` Superman ' and He Named Me Malala .

claim: Davis Guggenheim is a television producer and show-runner.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Since 2006 , Guggenheim is the only filmmaker to release three different documentaries that were ranked within the top 100 highest-grossing documentaries of all time  (  An Inconvenient Truth , It Might Get Loud , and Waiting for ′ Superman ′  )  .

claim: Davis Guggenheim is a television producer and show-runner.
premise_source_doc_sentence: An Inconvenient Truth is a 2006 American documentary film directed by Davis Guggenheim about former United States Vice President Al Gore 's campaign to educate citizens about global warming via a comprehensive slide show that , by his own estimate made in the film , he has given more than a thousand times .

claim: Davis Guggenheim is a television producer and show-runner.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Laurie David was so inspired by Gore 's slide show that she , with producer Lawrence Bender , met with Guggenheim to adapt the presentation into a film .

claim: Davis Guggenheim is a television producer and show-runner.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Early in his career , Cassidy edited the documentary film High Schools  (  1984  )  that was directed by Charles Guggenheim ; more recently he has edited several documentaries by Guggenheim 's son Davis Guggenheim , including An Inconvenient Truth  (  2006  )  .

claim: Davis Guggenheim is a television producer and show-runner.
